content.question: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on whether monolingual English speakers are at a disadvantage today.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on whether monolingual English speakers are at a disadvantage today.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
